qas.question: On what date was Abdirashid Ali Shermarke assassinated?
On what day, the day after the funeral of Abdirashid Ali Shermarke, did a coup occur?
Who was the commander of the army when the coup occurred?
What was Mohamed Siad Barre's rank?

context: On <a0_0>15 October 1969<a0_0/>, while paying a visit to the northern town of Las Anod, Somalia's then President Abdirashid Ali Shermarke was shot dead by <a1_0>one of his own bodyguards<a1_0/>. His assassination was quickly followed by a military coup d'état on <a2_0>21 October 1969<a2_0/> (the day after his funeral), in which the Somali Army seized power without encountering armed opposition — essentially a bloodless takeover. The putsch was spearheaded by <a4_0>Major General<a4_0/> <a3_0>Mohamed Siad Barre<a3_0/>, who at the time commanded the army.
